languages.text: {n}Великан исторгает свирепый рык, а его глаза наливаются кровью. Брызжа слюной подобно разъяренному зверю, он горестно кричит:{/n} "Ни к чему мне твоя вечность! Как я обрету славную смерть воина, ежели навеки увязну в бесчестных битвах, ведая лишь вкус гнилой крови нелюдей, пролитой по их же указке?!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Великан исторгает свирепый рык, а его глаза наливаются кровью. Брызжа слюной подобно разъяренному зверю, он горестно кричит:{/n} "Ни к чему мне твоя вечность! Как я обрету славную смерть воина, ежели навеки увязну в бесчестных битвах, ведая лишь вкус гнилой крови нелюдей, пролитой по их же указке?!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar lets out a ferocious roar and his eyes become bloodshot. Spraying spittle like a raging beast, he bellows mournfully,{/n} "I don't want your eternity! How can I claim the glory of a warrior's death if I am forever to trudge through honourless battles, to know of no taste but that of the putrid blood of inhumans spilt at their own behest?"
languages.original_text: {n}Великан исторгает свирепый рык, а его глаза наливаются кровью. Брызжа слюной подобно разъяренному зверю, он горестно кричит:{/n} "Ни к чему мне твоя вечность! Как я обрету славную смерть воина, ежели навеки увязну в бесчестных битвах, ведая лишь вкус гнилой крови нелюдей, пролитой по их же указке?!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar lets out a ferocious roar, and his eyes fill with blood. Spraying spittle like a raging beast, he bellows mournfully,{/n} "I don't want your eternity! How can I claim the glory of a warrior's death if I am forever to trudge through honourless battles, to know of no taste but that of the putrid blood of inhumans spilled at their own behest?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar lets out a ferocious roar and his eyes become bloodshot. Spraying spittle like a raging beast, he bellows mournfully,{/n} "I don't want your eternity! How can I claim the glory of a warrior's death if I am forever to trudge through honourless battles, to know of no taste but that of the putrid blood of inhumans spilt at their own behest?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar pousse un rugissement féroce, postillonnant comme une bête enragée. Les yeux injectés de sang, il mugit tristement :{/n} « Je ne veux pas de votre éternité ! Comment pourrai-je mourir comme un guerrier digne de ce nom si je me borne à combattre dans des batailles sans honneur, me contentant de faire couler le sang putride des non-humains ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar lets out a ferocious roar and his eyes become bloodshot. Spraying spittle like a raging beast, he bellows mournfully,{/n} "I don't want your eternity! How can I claim the glory of a warrior's death if I am forever to trudge through honourless battles, to know of no taste but that of the putrid blood of inhumans spilt at their own behest?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar pousse un rugissement féroce, postillonnant comme une bête enragée. Les yeux injectés de sang, il mugit tristement :{/n} « Je ne veux pas de votre éternité ! Comment pourrai-je mourir comme un guerrier digne de ce nom si je me borne à combattre dans des batailles sans honneur, me contentant de faire couler le sang putride des inhumains ? »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法发出了凶暴的嚎叫，两只眼睛布满了血丝。他像狂怒的野兽一样吐了口唾沫，哀伤地低吼起来。{/n}“我不想要什么无尽的杀戮！如果我注定要在毫无荣誉的战斗中屠戮，只能在异形的命令下屠杀其他异形，那当我战死的时候，又怎么可能得到属于战士的荣耀？”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar lets out a ferocious roar and his eyes become bloodshot. Spraying spittle like a raging beast, he bellows mournfully,{/n} "I don't want your eternity! How can I claim the glory of a warrior's death if I am forever to trudge through honourless battles, to know of no taste but that of the putrid blood of inhumans spilt at their own behest?"

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法发出了凶暴的嚎叫，两只眼睛布满了血丝。他像狂怒的野兽一样吐了口唾沫，哀伤地低吼起来。{/n}“我不想要什么无尽的杀戮！如果我注定要在毫无荣誉的战斗中屠戮，只能在异形的命令下屠杀其他异形，那当我战死的时候，又怎么可能得到属于战士的荣耀？”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーはどう猛な唸り声を上げ、目を血走らせると、暴れまわる獣のように唾を飛ばしながら悲しげに叫んだ。{/n}「お前の永遠なんているか！名誉のない戦いに明け暮れたあげく、外道どもが自ら流す腐った血しか味わえないとしたら、俺はどうやって戦士として栄光ある死を迎えられるんだ？」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar lets out a ferocious roar and his eyes become bloodshot. Spraying spittle like a raging beast, he bellows mournfully,{/n} "I don't want your eternity! How can I claim the glory of a warrior's death if I am forever to trudge through honourless battles, to know of no taste but that of the putrid blood of inhumans spilt at their own behest?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーはどう猛な唸り声を上げ、目を血走らせると、暴れまわる獣のように唾を飛ばしながら悲しげに叫んだ。{/n}「お前の永遠なんているか！名誉のない戦いに明け暮れたあげく、外道どもが自ら流す腐った血しか味わえないとしたら、俺はどうやって戦士として栄光ある死を迎えられるんだ？」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Mit blutunterlaufenen Augen brüllt Ulfar brüllt gefährlich herum. Speichelspukend wie eine rasende Bestie bellt er bedauernd:{/n} "Ich will Eure endlos lange Zeit nicht! Wie kann ich den Ruhm eines Kriegers beanspruchen, wenn ich immer nur ehrlose Schlachten schlagen muss? Und wenn ich nur den Geschmack verdorbenen Bluts von Nicht-Menschen erlebe, das sie auf eigenen Wunsch verschütten?"
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar lets out a ferocious roar and his eyes become bloodshot. Spraying spittle like a raging beast, he bellows mournfully,{/n} "I don't want your eternity! How can I claim the glory of a warrior's death if I am forever to trudge through honourless battles, to know of no taste but that of the putrid blood of inhumans spilt at their own behest?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit blutunterlaufenen Augen brüllt Ulfar brüllt gefährlich herum. Speichelspukend wie eine rasende Bestie bellt er bedauernd:{/n} "Ich will Eure endlos lange Zeit nicht! Wie kann ich den Ruhm eines Kriegers beanspruchen, wenn ich immer nur ehrlose Schlachten schlagen muss? Und wenn ich nur den Geschmack verdorbenen Bluts von Nicht-Menschen erlebe, das sie auf eigenen Wunsch verschütten?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar profiere un feroz rugido y sus ojos se inyectan en sangre. Parece una bestia desbocada, echando espumarajos de rabia mientras chilla:{/n} «¡No quiero tu eternidad! ¿Cómo hallaré la gloriosa muerte de un guerrero si he de pasar los eones librando batallas deshonrosas, sin probar otra cosa que la pútrida sangre de estos inhumanos que ellos mismos derraman para su deleite?».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar lets out a ferocious roar and his eyes become bloodshot. Spraying spittle like a raging beast, he bellows mournfully,{/n} "I don't want your eternity! How can I claim the glory of a warrior's death if I am forever to trudge through honourless battles, to know of no taste but that of the putrid blood of inhumans spilt at their own behest?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar profiere un feroz rugido y sus ojos se inyectan en sangre. Parece una bestia desbocada, echando espumarajos de rabia mientras chilla:{/n} «¡No quiero tu eternidad! ¿Cómo hallaré la gloriosa muerte de un guerrero si he de pasar los eones librando batallas deshonrosas, sin probar otra cosa que la pútrida sangre de estos inhumanos que ellos mismos derraman para su deleite?».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Gözleri kan çanağına dönen Ulfar, kudurmuşçasına kükrüyor. Öfkeli bir hayvan misali salya saçarak kederle feryat ediyor.{/n} "Ebediyet mebediyet istemiyorum! Sonsuza dek şerefsizlikle dolu savaşlara batsam, insan dışıların kendi istekleriyle dökülmüş iğrenç kanından başka tat alamasam, savaşçılara layık bir ölümün getireceği şana nasıl kavuşabilirim?"
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar lets out a ferocious roar and his eyes become bloodshot. Spraying spittle like a raging beast, he bellows mournfully,{/n} "I don't want your eternity! How can I claim the glory of a warrior's death if I am forever to trudge through honourless battles, to know of no taste but that of the putrid blood of inhumans spilt at their own behest?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar kudurmuşçasına kükrüyor, gözleri kan çanağına dönüyor. Öfkeli bir hayvan misali salya saçarak kederle feryat ediyor.{/n} "Ebediyet mebediyet istemiyorum! Sonsuza dek şerefsizlikle dolu savaşlara batsam, insan dışıların kendi istekleriyle dökülmüş iğrenç kanından başka tat alamasam, nasıl olur da savaşçılara layık bir ölümün getireceği şana kavuşabilirim?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
